snippet: Those who knew the previous iteration of the Old Lyme Inn, which reopened in April, will find a brighter and airier interior, but with a familiar, cozy atmosphere.
abstract: Stephanie Lyness reviews Old Lyme Inn, in Old Lyme (Metropolitan/Connecticut).
lead_paragraph: Those who knew the previous iteration of the Old Lyme Inn, which reopened in April, will find a brighter and airier interior, but with a familiar, cozy atmosphere.

headline.seo: A Review of the Old Lyme Inn, in Old Lyme
headline.main: Original Charm Survives a Year of Renovation
headline.print_headline: Original Charm Survives A Year of Renovation
